{{Wired embedded system |brand=Boundary Devices |model=Hydrogen |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=03/2009 |type=wired embedded board |pwr_conn=Molex (2-pin) |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP270M;Intel XScale PXA270; |cpu1_cspeed=520 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128-P33B85 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Qimonda |ram1_model=HYB39S256160FF-7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=ASIX |eth_chip1_model=AX88796 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=256K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256;;1;,,, 1.4W Mono Class-D Audio Power Amplifier;TI;TPA2005;;1;,,, Audio Codec W/ Touch Screen Controller and PMM;NXP;;UCB1400;;1;,,, 3A Low Dropout Positive Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1085;;1;,,, Dual RS-232 Transmitter/Receiver;Intersil;ISL3232E;;2;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;NXP;SN74LVC244A;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, Audio 3.5mm out, LCD, |oui_eth=00:19:B8 }} {{TagLine|Hydrogen - Embedded Single Board Computer}}
"HYDROGEN", "Rev. 010", "Boundary Devices" and :"February 2009" are silkscreened on the PCB.
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88AP270M @520MHz :[[Intel XScale]] PXA270 (''Bulverde'') *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR), :SD (TF) Card slots *RAM: 64MB (DDR2) *Video Output: LCD *Audio Output: Analog via 3.5mm *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG)
__NOTOC__
